column3: Fallon approached the gat at two minutes past one, his swagger evidence of his satisfaction at the turn of events.

column2: A little after one o’clock in the morning
column3: A little after one o’clock in the morning, Perena Lewitz arrived at the airport and headed to the Lanea Willats. The spotlights seemed to exaggerate the vast bloated shape of the Q-series freighter.
